mapper.select: SELECT t_user.name name, t_goods.id id, t_goods.title title, t_goods.price price, t_img_goods.path pic_path, t_img_goods.NAME pic_name FROM t_user, t_goods, t_img_goods WHERE t_goods.id_user = t_user.id AND t_goods.id = t_img_goods.id_goods AND t_goods.state = 1 ORDER BY time_create DESC LIMIT 8
